    public class MapGPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

    Peter

      • getDamageIndex

        private int getDamageIndex(Block block)
        get the index for Destruction array based on the current health state of the block
        Parameters:
        block - - the Block we want to get index for
        Returns:
        number below _destructionPaths.length if there is a proper index , else return the _destructionPaths.length
